Posts.Content: Contrary wrote: I am 43 and just diagnosed with DCIS stage 0 (nearing stage 1). The affected area is 3" x 1" so I am considering mastectomy rather than lumpectomy. I would appreciate some feedback from others who have had the Flap reconstruction. How long was your surgery and hospital stay? How long was your recovery etc? Anything you think i should know or consider before making my final decision? Log in to post a reply
